23/* This file is heavily based on the file mkstemp.c which is part of the
24 fileutils package. */
25
26
27extern int gen_tempname(char *, int = 0);
28
29/* Generate a unique temporary directory name from TEMPLATE.
30 The last six characters of TEMPLATE must be "XXXXXX";
31 they are replaced with a string that makes the filename unique.
32 Then open the directory and return a fd. */
33int mksdir(char *tmpl)
34{
35 return gen_tempname(tmpl, 1);
36}
37
